SEARCH

Package src.HRS.Model

package src.HRS.Model
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DeluxeRoom
    Represents a deluxe room in the hotel, extending the Room class.
    DiscountCode
    Represents an abstract class for discount codes that can be applied to reservations.
    ExecutiveRoom
    Represents an executive room in the hotel, extending the Room class.
    Hotel
    Represents a hotel with a name, base price, list of rooms, ist of reservations, and list of date price modifiers.
    HRSModel
    The HRSModel class represents a model for managing a collection of hotels.
    IWorkHere
    Represents a discount code for employees, providing a 10% discount.
    Payday
    Represents a Payday discount code, providing a 7% discount for reservations spanning certain dates.
    Reservation
    Represents a reservation with guest details, check-in and check-out dates, a room, a discount code (if applicable), and a list of date price modifiers.
    Room
    Represents a hotel room with a name, type, and base price.
    Stay4Get1
    Represents a Stay4Get1 discount code, providing a free night for reservations of five or more nights.
